items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress, But the White Is Too Sheer
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and super on-trend â€” the matching scarf detail is such a fashionable touch. I originally ordered it in white to possibly wear for my engagement party, but unfortunately the fabric is really thin and see-through, which makes it look a bit cheaper in that color. That said, itâ€™s comfortable, stretchy, and the ruching around the stomach area is really flattering. Iâ€™d definitely buy it again in one of the darker shades â€” especially for the price, itâ€™s a great value! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars See through
items.body: I was so disappointed with this dress! I ordered it last minute for a special occasion, and it was a total fail. It's so see-through that I can't even post a picture of it. The material is incredibly thin honestly, it felt and looked toilet paper. It could have been cute, but the quality is just awful. Definitely not worth it. Read more

The fit hugs just right without feeling restrictive, and the back split adds that perfect touch of sass and movement. ðŸŒ¹ I love how it blends sexy and classy so effortlessly â€” itâ€™s the kind of dress that makes you walk a little taller and smile a little wider. Pair it with heels and statement earrings, and youâ€™re ready to own the night! ðŸ’„ðŸ‘  Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cocktail dress, flattering and pretty!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I am obsessed with this dress. Huxrakv womens strapless dress is the dress I didnâ€™t know I needed. This dress is a beautiful surprise because the way it looks once I opened the package made me a little worried and I put it aside then when I was free I tried it on having zero hope it will look good but surprise! This dress looks awesome when tried on. It is so beautiful, so flattering and just cute. It is the perfect cocktail dress. It is so easy to style. It comes with this little beautiful scarf that can be worn in so many different ways and still giving a beautiful look to the dress. I even tried it with a denim jacket and still looking gorgeous. It can be paired with heals or sneakers honestly it looks amazing all the way. The fact that thereâ€™s draping in the top makes it very flattering to any body type. It is also elastic so it can fit easily without any hassle and it would fit like a glove. It is very comfortable and very easy to put it on. There are no zippers or buttons, just slide the dress on and off you go. I love it and totally recommend it. It is worth the price. Read more
items.author: Mayada

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin but stylish
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This maxi dress has an elegant design; however, the fabric is a bit thin, and you can see your underwear underneath it. Size and Quality: I am 5â€™6â€ tall, weigh 108 pounds, and I ordered size small; it fit perfectly, even in length. The material consists of a lightweight polyester. The fabric feels lightweight and stretchy. The white color looks just as pictured. The folds in the front of the dress look very stylish and elegant. The strapless design also holds on well all day. It is very comfortable to wear. The scarf that comes with it, you are able to style in various ways, from around your shoulders, neck, or any way you prefer, as it isnâ€™t attached. Overall: It is a bit overpriced for the thin fabric. It looks elegant, holds up well, and is comfortable to wear. It is great for an event or summer; I recommend wearing nude color underwear underneath. Read more
items.author: Sheila Tamm

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Split Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Split Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wd45-burgundy, Wd45-black, Wd45-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
